title: Elemental Weapon
content:
ldur's Gate 3. Elemental Weapon is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Elemental Weapon Information
